name: Lonely Vectors
description:
Lonely Vectors - Description in progress!

This game was made for Major Jam 2, but in barely over 24 hours, since I joined the jam Saturday evening.

Here's the link to my 128x128px tileset (this was the jam's limitation)

Controls

Arrows / page controls to scroll, type a letter to place that vector, press Enter to restart whenever you want

Fully playable with a mouse (just single click a vector to add it)

There are only 3 levels
